name: vec3
description: Creates a 3D vector with x, y, and z coordinates. Vectors are used for positions, directions, and other 3D calculations.

returns.description: A 3D vector object with x, y, and z properties

example:
-- Create position vectors
local spawnPoint = vec3(0, 10, 0)
local targetPos = vec3(15, 5, 20)

-- Use in world functions
local world = CreateWorld(32, 32)
FillBlocksInWorld(world, vec3(0, 0, 0), vec3(10, 1, 10))

-- Use for entity positioning
SetEntityCoords(playerEntity, vec3(5, 2, 5))
notes: X and Z coordinates represent horizontal position
Vectors are required for most position-related functions
Coordinates can be negative or decimal values
